title: Alt-tab makes me bugsplat all the time
body: It seems its been only happening to me and it sucks cuz when I do it to close tabs and get my game running better, I have to wait about 3 minutes to reconnect and get back into the game.

replies.body: When are you *Alt+Tabbing*? You can often encounter issues if you *ALt+Tab* when you're loading into a game, prior to the champion portraits and summoner icons pop up.
My alt-tab issues occur  anywhere in game, whether it be loading prior to the portaits, during the portraits, or in game.

Gotcha. In that case, this is likely caused by a driver or hardware issue, therefore, I'd recommend working through the solutions listed inside our [**Bugsplat guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) to address this issue.

Please let me know how those steps worked for you.
Seems like all my issues originated from installing Plays.TV. I'm gonna uninstall it and see if something happens.
Plays.tv has caused issues with League in the past, so I wouldn't be too surprised. Let me know if that ended up being the culprit of your issues!
Yup. My problem has been solved it seemed as plays.tv did cause this issue. Thanks for the help

Alright I followed all the steps for the computer I'm using and I'm heading into game to try it out. Ill edit the comment again to tell you the result
EDIT: Following all the steps, I tried to go in game and I still crashed.
